{"id":730660487,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1656139701,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/730660487/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"26.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(int i=n-2; i>=0; i--){\n            if(nums[i]>nums[i+1])\n            {\n                cnt++;\n                if(i+1==n-1){\n                    nums[i+1] = nums[i];\n                }\n                else if(i==0){\n                    nums[i] = nums[i+1];\n                }\n                else if(i+2<n && nums[i]<=nums[i+2]){\n                    nums[i+1] = nums[i+2];\n                }\n                else{\n                    nums[i] = nums[i+1];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        // cout<<cnt<<endl;\n        return cnt<=1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
